summary: "The Transformers" was an animated TV show that aired from 1984 to 1987, based on a toy line by Hasbro and Takara. It's about giant robots, called Transformers, who can turn into vehicles. The good guys, the Autobots, led by Optimus Prime, fight the bad guys, the Decepticons, led by Megatron. The series was made by Marvel Productions and Sunbow Productions, with help from Japanese and Korean animation studios. There was also a movie, "The Transformers: The Movie," that came out in 1986. Fans call this series "Generation One."
title: The Transformers (TV series)
